ABookCase Orbital Reference System

v0.4.0.0

This is a request from ABookCase who wanted a simple mod that displays altitude of an orbit at a point by hovering the mouse over it. So I did that and also added time information and more. There is a config file in PluginData folder that can be modified to tweak was is displayed on screen.

The mouse is not shown in the screenshots, but I'm sure you can imagine it.

http://imgur.com/a/K6wiA

Download:

Get v0.4.1.0 from GitHub!

Also available through SpaceDock and CKAN!

Licensed under MIT

I'd like to thank xEvilReeperx for his solution.

Edited May 16, 2016 by Lennartos

Back in late May, I wanted two things:

  1. To try my hand at programming something actually useful.
  2. Something like ABCORS, but for velocity instead of altitude.

It was a really small tweak. Still took a while though, me being the novice I am. But it worked well enough so I sent a pull request to zentarul who promised to take a look at it. Until then, you can download it from here: https://github.com/audiorate/abcors/blob/master/release build/ABCORS.dll?raw=true

Now with Speed and Angle to Prograde support as well as working on the orbit of the active target. Some options are disabled by default and need to be enabled in the config file.

For the next version I will try to add a simple GUI window in to edit the configs.
